aboutUs.title: About Strandly
aboutUs.paragraph1: At Strandly, we believe your hair is your crown—and finding the right hands to care for it should feel effortless.
aboutUs.paragraph2: We are a premium booking platform for Afro hairstylists across Europe, connecting clients with trusted stylists who understand the beauty and versatility of Afro hair.
aboutUs.paragraph3: Whether you’re looking for braids, twists, locs, silk presses, or a new protective style, Strandly makes the journey simple:
aboutUs.bullet1: Discover inspiration from curated Afro hairstyles.
aboutUs.bullet2: Connect with verified stylists and explore their portfolios.
aboutUs.bullet3: Book your appointment in seconds—no DMs, no waiting, just beautiful results.
aboutUs.paragraph4: For stylists, Strandly is more than a booking tool—it’s a stage for your talent. We help you showcase your work, attract new clients, and manage your schedule with ease, so you can focus on what you do best: creating beauty and confidence.
aboutUs.paragraph5: Strandly isn’t just an app. It’s a community where Afro hair is celebrated, cared for, and elevated.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy statement explains the personal data Strandly processes, how Strandly processes it, and for what purposes.
privacy_policy.information_we_collect_text: We collect data to operate effectively and provide you with the best experiences with our services. You provide some of this data directly, such as when you create an account, while other data is collected automatically based on your interaction with our services.
privacy_policy.how_we_use_your_information_text: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to develop new ones, and to protect Strandly and our users. We also use this information to offer you tailored content – like giving you more relevant search results and ads.
privacy_policy.your_rights_text: You have the right to access, rectify, or erase your personal data, as well as the right to restrict or object to certain processing of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.intro: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Strandly's Website, located at strandly.com.
terms_of_service.acceptance: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use Strandly if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
terms_of_service.license_text: Unless otherwise stated, Strandly and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on Strandly. All rights reserved. You may access this from Strandly for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.
terms_of_service.user_comments_text: This Agreement shall begin on the date hereof. Certain parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information. Strandly does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of Strandly, its agents and/or affiliates.

cookie_policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookie_policy.intro: This is the Cookie Policy for Strandly, accessible from strandly.com
cookie_policy.what_are_cookies_text: As is common practice with almost all professional websites this site uses cookies, which are tiny files that are downloaded to your computer, to improve your experience. This page describes what information they gather, how we use it and why we sometimes need to store these cookies.
cookie_policy.how_we_use_cookies_text: We use cookies for a variety of reasons detailed below. Unfortunately in most cases there are no industry standard options for disabling cookies without completely disabling the functionality and features they add to this site. It is recommended that you leave on all cookies if you are not sure whether you need them or not in case they are used to provide a service that you use.
cookie_policy.disabling_cookies_text: You can prevent the setting of cookies by adjusting the settings on your browser (see your browser Help for how to do this). Be aware that disabling cookies will affect the functionality of this and many other websites that you visit. Disabling cookies will usually result in also disabling certain functionality and features of this site.

learn_more.title: Your Hair. Your Style. Your Strandly.
learn_more.intro: Finding the perfect Afro hairstylist used to mean scrolling for hours, saving screenshots, and hoping for a repin. Strandly changes that.
learn_more.features_intro: We've created a space where beauty meets convenience.
learn_more.feature1: Explore hairstyles that inspire you—braids, twists, silk presses, and everything in between.
learn_more.feature2: Connect with trusted stylists near you, see their work and check real reviews.
learn_more.feature3: Book with confidence in just a few taps, no calls or waiting required.
learn_more.stylist_section: And if you're a stylist. Strandly was built for you too. Showcase your craft, grow your bookings, and let your talent shine while we handle the admin.
learn_more.conclusion: Your hair journey deserves to feel effortless—and with Strandly, it finally does.
learn_more.cta: Join the waitlist today and be first to experience

cookie_consent.title: We value your privacy
cookie_consent.description: We use cookies to personalize content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyze our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you've provided to them or that they've collected from your use of their services.
cookie_consent.rightsDescription: You can withdraw your consent at any time and change your cookie settings. For more information, see our Privacy Policy.

necessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to display relevant advertisements to you.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: These cookies store your preferences and settings.

microsoft_clarity.title: Microsoft Clarity
microsoft_clarity.description: These cookies are used by Microsoft Clarity to record user sessions and generate heatmaps, helping us understand how users interact with our website.

tawk_to.title: Live Chat (Tawk.to)
tawk_to.description: This service provides live chat functionality, allowing you to communicate directly with our support team.
